an4.201:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a worse person,
an4.201:1.2: a good person and a better person.
an4.201:1.3: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
an4.201:2.2: It’s someone who kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
an4.201:2.3: This is called a bad person.
an4.201:3.1: And what is a worse person?
an4.201:3.2: It’s someone who kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. And they encourage others to do these things.
an4.201:3.7: This is called a worse person.
an4.201:4.1: And what is a good person?
an4.201:4.2: It’s someone who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
an4.201:4.3: This is called a good person.
an4.201:5.1: And what is a better person?
an4.201:5.2: It’s someone who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. And they encourage others to avoid these things.
an4.201:5.7: This is called a better person.”
